about_the_game:
《Jack and Bursh》 is a Roguelike challenge game that combines magic, action, and shooting elements. Players will play various characters with abilities and constantly challenge their limits in a different world!

Players will experience three initial characters, four weapons, a pet, a mechanical unit, and their unique combat modes in the trial version! At the same time, we provide 4 slots for weapons to insert dozens of reinforcement cards!

These reinforcement cards will provide various status bonuses for the main weapon!

At the same time, in the trial version, we have provided an egg twisting machine. Various decorations in the egg twisting machine will provide players with various additional abilities such as blood sucking ability, attack power, defense power, shooting speed, and additional bonuses when using items, among other decorative pendants!

In the upcoming official version, we will provide players with more characters, more weapon types, more decorative pendants, and more intricately designed game levels!

《Jack and Bursh》 is a Roguelike challenge game that combines magic, action, and shooting elements. Players will play various characters with abilities and constantly challenge their limits in a different world!

Players will experience three initial characters, four weapons, a pet, a mechanical unit, and their unique combat modes in the trial version! At the same time, we provide 4 slots for weapons to insert dozens of reinforcement cards!

These reinforcement cards will provide various status bonuses for the main weapon!

At the same time, in the trial version, we have provided an egg twisting machine. Various decorations in the egg twisting machine will provide players with various additional abilities such as blood sucking ability, attack power, defense power, shooting speed, and additional bonuses when using items, among other decorative pendants!

In the upcoming official version, we will provide players with more characters, more weapon types, more decorative pendants, and more intricately designed game levels!
name: JackAndBursh杰克和刷子

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/AMD Ryzen 5
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
